definitions.definition: To make sudden loud noises, and often repeatedly, especially by exploding or hitting something.
definitions.example: My head was banging after drinking all night at the concert.
David and Mary banged into each other.
We can hear the couple banging upstairs.

definitions.definition: (with "in") To hammer or to hit anything hard.
definitions.example: Hold the picture while I bang in this nail.

definitions.definition: To cut squarely across, as the tail of a horse, or a person's forelock; to cut (the hair).

definitions.example: Do you smoke meth? No, I bang it.

definitions.definition: The action of the verb to bang.
definitions.example: Strange bangings in the old house were ascribed to a poltergeist.

definitions.definition: Excellent, brilliant, very exciting, top, great.
definitions.example: Wow, what a banging haircut! It looks terrific!
